WorkItem.Description:
In the Options pane, under the Burst Style and Sustained Style dropdowns, the main heals are still listed as Lesser Healing Wave & Healing Wave.  I think all Blizzard did was rename them LHW > HW and HW > GHW, and left the spell effects the same, but it happened long enough ago that I don't remember for sure.
Â 
In any case, this probably should be updated to the new spell names, at least so newcomers won't be confused by outdated names (even with the same effects) when they try to configure.

Comments.Message: Model is still being re-written, so please bear with me as I get these cleaned out.  Oddly enough, I believe they are listed as healing surge in the in-model abreviations I use.

Honestly, I noticed they were out of date a couple months ago, but only remembered when I was looking at patch changes today.

Healing Surge?  Nobody uses healing surge!  :D

Take your time, and thanks for keeping it updated.
